fields.name: Moisturizing Face Mask
fields.description: Overnight moisturizing face mask. Vegan and cruelty-free, this mask is infused with coconut water and prickly pear extract to hydrate, vitamin B-3 to energize, and fatty acids to seal in moisture so your skin stays supple and strong

fields.name: Caffeine-Infused Wake Up Serum
fields.description: Wake up on the right side of the bed with this vegan, cruelty-free, caffeine-infused serum that treats puffy skin and dark undereye circles.

fields.name: Clear Skin Kit
fields.description: Five essentials that work in harmony to revitalize dry, dehydrated skin, replenish vital moisture, and gently cleanse for deeply conditioned skin. Omega-rich fatty acids and vitamin c help keep your skin clear and vibrant.
